definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: Night terrors are an inherited problem and occur in about 2% of children.
sentences.chinese: 夜驚是遺傳性的，約2%的孩子會有夜驚問題。

sentences.english: Some children appear possibly during Morpheus nocturnal Jing and somnambulate.
sentences.chinese: 有些兒童在睡眠期間可能出現夜驚和夢遊等。

sentences.english: Night terrors must make long-term relationshipsdifficult.
sentences.chinese: 夜驚一定讓人們無法長期相處。

sentences.english: Night terrors can be a frightening phenomenon of childhood but they are not dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 夜驚是童年期的一種可怕現象，但並無危險。
